title: 自己用Crackshot做了两个武器
txt_content:
longji:
    Item_Information:
        Item_Name: "&6&l龙击炮"
        Item_Type: 156
        Item_Lore: "&6可对火力覆盖范围内的目标|&6进行区域的范围杀伤|&6并可瞬间爆发出无比惊人的威力。|&2&l黑龙炮削弱版"
        Sounds_Acquired: BAT_TAKEOFF-1-1-0
    Shooting:
        Cancel_Left_Click_Block_Damage: true
        Cancel_Right_Click_Interactions: true
        Delay_Between_Shots: 40

        Projectile_Speed: 10

        Projectile_Incendiary:
            Enable: true
            Duration: 80
        Bullet_Spread: 2.8
        Removal_Or_Drag_Delay: 10-true
        Reset_Fall_Distance: true

    Reload:

        Sounds_Reloading: NOTE_STICKS-1-1-0,NOTE_SNARE_DRUM-1-6-1

        Type: break
        Open_Duration: 10
        Close_Duration: 15

        Sound_Close: DOOR_CLOSE-1-2-0
